abilities.name: Dragon Veil
abilities.effect: As long as Kingdra is in play, each of your Active Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Hyper Whirlpool
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aqua Sonic
attacks.effect: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.
